_header: Hail holy Ositha maid of great virtue
_description: A prayer to St. Ositha, perhaps by Lydgate — a ballade, three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with refrain ending ‘in there nede’

CamSidney37.First Lines:
HEyle holy Sitha maide of grete vertuwiche with hole herte and
                    deuoute obseruance…
CamSidney37.Last Lines:
…Agayne worldly troubill and fendis violenceSupporte alle tho
                    that calle the in there nede

BLHar2255.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 137.
